thread.section_title: Walker Hotel Greenwich Village - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Truly a quiet oasis!!
thread.title_full: Truly a quiet oasis!! - Review of Walker Hotel Greenwich Village, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ariellejacksonjoe
title: Truly a quiet oasis!!
text:
Don't hesitate to book here! I'm telling you! I've stayed at several hotels in the city in this price range. The Walker has a warm lobby to come home to after a cold snowy day, cozy beds, kind staff, perfect location, and quiet rooms! Our room was across from the elevator on the 12th floor, but we never heard a peep!
There is a quaint gourmet Italian restaurant across the street that I recommend -and other nearby shopping, drug stores and restaurants!
I will definitely return!!!
Just a note: no in-room fridge or coffee maker
